lead_paragraph: Linas Phillips’s film revolves around a developmentally disabled 40-year-old virgin — a bully who uses his condition to guilt others into excusing his bad behavior.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Rainbow Time,’ Big Brother’s Watching (and Lusting)

snippet: Linas Phillips’s film revolves around a developmentally disabled 40-year-old virgin — a bully who uses his condition to guilt others into excusing his bad behavior....
abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie Rainbow Time, written, directed by and starring Linas Phillips.
